title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre eager to join forces with peers to stand up for an important cause today. As emboldened allies, you show yourselves to be formidable foes to your opposition with the binding momentum of the vocal Gemini Moons trine to brave Mars in your 3rd House of Communication. Nevertheless, be careful not to succumb to a mob mentality. There is power in numbers as long as you stay invested in the facts and clear with your goals. First Lady Eleanor Roosevelt wrote, Justice cannot be for one side alone, but must be for both. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
